entry.title: RT Sam Williams 🐘: Almost 70 million documents about the war in Ukraine have now been permanently stored in the Arweave network. These records are ...
entry.summary: RT Sam Williams 🐘 Almost 70 million documents about the war in Ukraine have now been permanently stored in the Arweave network. These records are stored in hundreds of places across the world, backed by an endowment, with no centralized points of failure. Blockchains are not just for finance.
